original_text: Someone has sold me and my people as if we are animals. Now they will kill us and completely destroy us all. If we had been sold to become slaves, I would not have spoken to the king. It would not have been important enough for that.’
korean_text: 나와 내 민족이 팔려서 죽임과 도륙함과 진멸함을 당하게 되었나이다 만일 우리가 노비로 팔렸더라면 내가 잠잠하였으리이다 그래도 대적이 왕의 손해를 보충하지 못하였으리이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Someone has sold me and my people

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 모두를 완전히 멸망시킬 것입니다

sentences.original_text: If we had been sold to become slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 우리가 노예가 되기 위해 팔렸다면

sentences.original_text: I would not have spoken to the king
It would not have been important enough for that
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그럴 만큼 중요하지 않았을 것입니다
